reviewText: I purchased this movie (Money Plays) for my daughter.  I had briefly described the movie to her, being both with drama and amusement, also knowing she liked Roy Scheider.  I'm sure she will enjoy the movie as it meets all my expectations, as well as being rated PG.  Thanks, L.T., NE Oklahoma
Loved it.  Had some interesting plot twists, liked the two main actors in their older incarnations, and loved the death scene in the beginning.
